channel.title: Virtual Reality on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Virtual Reality on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Venice Unveils VR Interactive Lineup
item.description: Emmy-nominated VR director Eliza McNitt (‘Spheres’) heads up the competition jury at Venice’s virtual reality showcase, which includes new projects from Edward Berger, Doug Liman and Charlotte Mikkelb
